original_text: Of this gospel I was made a minister according to the gift of God's grace, which was given me by the working of his power.
korean_text: 이 복음을 위하여 그의 능력이 역사하시는 대로 내게 주신 하나님의 은혜의 선물을 따라 내가 일꾼이 되었노라

sentences.original_text: Of this gospel I was made a minister
according to the gift of God's grace
by the working of his power
